name: WP Post Category Notifications
author: Markus Alexander Lehmann

sections.description:
WP Post Category Notifications is a plugin which sends category specific email notifications whenever a post is published.
For detailed informationa please visit: http://jf-weser-ems.de/wp-post-category-notifications/
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to ‘/wp-content/plugins/wp-post-category-notifications’ or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the ‘Settings’->’WP Post Category Notifications’ screen to configure the plugin
sections.faq:
Does this plugin need writing privileges?

If you turn off logging plugin would not need writing privileges.
sections.changelog:
